comment:
Vicky
Nose - Prickly, honey, 
Palatte - solvent,  Smokey and medicinal.
Finish - medium finish

Tim
Thick legs
Nose - Pungent (alcohol) , floral honeysuckle, little sulphuric, dries nose
Palette - warm, Smokey, peaty, vanilla, charred wood.  After adding water it opens up nicely and you get a little more floral vanilla honeysuckle.
Finish - charred wood, nice finish, little suphur, little plastic.  After water, a little tartness is evident.
